lst.name: sentence
lst.str: President Corazon Aquino announced earlier this month that proceeds from the sale of APT-controlled assets would be used to finance the government's land reform program, which aims to distribute about 9.7 mln hectares of land to poor peasants.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said he had told cabinet ministers sceptical about the identities of buyers that "Marcos cronies" could easily put up legitimate fronts if they were specifically barred from bidding for assets on the block.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But David SyCip, chief executive trustee of the Asset Privatisation Trust (APT), told a meeting of financial executives the APT has not yet received a list of the firms.
